title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 32.2 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 32.2 - Introduction

State Regulations

The commissioner requires that insurance identification
cards including for hire insurance certificates, hereinafter referred to as ID
cards, be issued as paper proof of motor vehicle liability insurance. ID cards
shall be issued in conformance with this Part and shall be carried in a vehicle
at all times. ID cards shall be presented to the department in accordance with
this Part, Parts 34 and 35 of this Title and the registration, licensing, insurance, and other administrative procedures of the department. Information
provided by ID cards shall be verified electronically by insurance companies as
required by this Part and the reporting requirements set forth in Part 34 of
this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
32.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
